data.author: MicroByte

changelog.release_notes: * Fixed bug where battery wasn't updating when bluetooth was off.

* Updated with Analog face option
* Turn bluetooth monitoring off
* Turn Seconds hand off (analog option)
Format time based on your time preference, sorry about that!

+ Cleaned up graphics
+ Right Blue bar now reflects Bluetooth Connection status

data.description:
Based on THE most popular spy watch face in Goldeneye, it's PebbleEye 007!
Based on THE most popular spy watch face in Goldeneye, it's PebbleEye 007!

Relive those glory N64 days by owning the most spytastic watch face that the NSA could only dream about!

*** NEW FEATURES ***

* Select between Analog and Digital Style
* Turn Bluetooth monitor off
* Turn Seconds Off

Left (red bar) is the Pebble Battery Meter which goes down as your battery depletes.

Right (blue bar) is your BlueTooth Connection.  It's lit up when connected and faded blue when not connected.

Hit the love button if you've got a popular spy theme going through your head now!

latest_release.release_notes: * Fixed bug where battery wasn't updating when bluetooth was off.

data.title: PebbleEye 007
